name: Yan Zheng 0002
content: ZHENG YAN / 郑岩 | Tianjin University / 天津大学 About Me I’m now a Associate Professor in Tianjin University, co-learding the Deep Reinforcement Learning Lab, founded by Prof. Jianye Hao (郝建业). Before that, I was a Research Fellow at Nanyang Technological Univesrsity (NTU) and worked in the research group of Prof. Liu Yang (刘杨). Ads: We are taking self-motivated PhDs, masters, research interns and full-time researchers. If you are interested in the research topics (see here), please send us your CV! Contact: yanzheng@tju.edu.cn / jianye.hao@tju.edu.cn Research Interests Reinfrocement Learning (RL): representation RL, offline RL, model-based RL, transfer RL. Multiagent System (MAS): cooperative/competitive learning, opponent modeling. Large-scale Learning System: distributed RL, evolutioanry RL. News [Jan. 2023] Our four paper (one spotlight) are accepted to ICLR 2023 ! [Dec. 2022] Our solution won the 1st prize in the NeruIPS Driving SMARTS Competition (Track 1 & 2) NeruIPS 2022 Competition ! [Nov. 2022] Our paper is accepted to AAAI 2023 ! [Oct. 2022] Our three papers are accepted to NeurIPS DeepRL Workshop 2022 ! [Sep. 2022] Our paper about Symoblic RL is accepted to NeurIPS 2022 ! [Jun. 2022] Our paper about cooperative multiagent RL is accepted to ICML 2022 ! [May. 2022] Our paper about transfer RL is accepted to UAI 2022 ! [Apr. 2022] Our paper about representation RL is accepted to IJCAI 2022 ! [Feb. 2022] Our paper is accepted to Applied Energy 2022 (SCI 1 / impact factor: 11.456) ! [Jan. 2022] Our paper about (action) representation RL is accepted to ICLR 2022 ! [Feb. 2022] Our paper about representation RL is accepted to AAAI 2022 ! [Dec. 2021] Our paper about negoation won the Best Paper Award at PRICAI 2022. [Nov. 2021] Our paper about cooperative MAS is accepted to NeruIPS 2021 workshop ! [Nov. 2021] Our paper about exploration in RL is accepted to NeruIPS 2021 workshop ! [Aug. 2021] Our paper is accepted to ASE 2022 Industry Track ! [Apr. 2021] Our paper about cooperative MAS in smartgrid is accepted to IEEE TSG 2021 (SCI 1 / impact factor: 10.275) ! [Jan. 2021] Our paper about RL for automatic web testing is accepted by ICSE 2021.
